measure.name: set_wshp_inputs
measure.description: Allows the user to change one or more Water Source Heat Pump attributes in the model. Can be applied to all WSHPs in the model or to filtered based on the name.
measure.modeler_description: Loops through ZoneHVACWaterToAirHeatPump objects in the model and changes the attributes based on user input.

argument.name: string
argument.display_name: Set inputs for equipment containing the string (case sensitive, enter *.* for all):

argument.name: wshp_flow_clg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Supply Air Flow Rate During Cooling Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: wshp_flow_htg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Supply Air Flow Rate During Heating Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: wshp_flow_no_clg_or_htg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Supply Air Flow Rate When No Cooling or Heating is Needed {ft3/min}

argument.name: wshp_oa_clg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Outdoor Air Flow Rate During Cooling Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: wshp_oa_htg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Outdoor Air Flow Rate During Heating Operation {ft3/min}

argument.name: wshp_oa_no_clg_or_htg
argument.display_name: WSHP: Outdoor Air Flow Rate When No Cooling or Heating is Needed {ft3/min}

argument.name: fan_eff_tot
argument.display_name: Fan: Fan Total Efficiency

argument.name: fan_rise
argument.display_name: Fan: Pressure Rise {inH2O}

argument.name: fan_flow
argument.display_name: Fan: Maximum Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: fan_eff_mot
argument.display_name: Fan: Motor Efficiency

argument.name: hc_air_flow
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Air Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: hc_wtr_flow
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Rated Water Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: hc_cap
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Gross Rated Heating Capacity {Btu/h}

argument.name: hc_cop
argument.display_name: Htg Coil: Gross Rated Heating COP

argument.name: cc_air_flow
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Rated Air Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: cc_wtr_flow
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Rated Water Flow Rate {ft3/min}

argument.name: cc_cap
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Cooling Capacity {Btu/h}

argument.name: cc_sen_cap
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Sensible Cooling Capacity {Btu/h}

argument.name: cc_cop
argument.display_name: Clg Coil: Gross Rated Cooling COP
